ActCanada Pension Plan
Old Age Security Act
SubjectTerms and Conditions of an Agreement on Social Security between Canada and India.
PrecisOrder approving the TERMS AND CONDITIONS of the AGREEMENT ON SOCIAL SECURITY between Canada and the REPUBLIC OF INDIA. The purpose of the Agreement is to coordinate the operation of Canadaâ€™s Old Age Security program and the Canada Pension Plan with the comparable pension programs of India.
